meanings.definition: The quality or state of being suitable for wearing or able to be worn.
meanings.sent1: The wearability of the shoes was excellent, making them perfect for long walks.
meanings.sent2: She always considers the wearability of her clothes before buying them.
meanings.sent3: The wearability of the costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The wearability of the fabric was like a soft cloud against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The wearability of the gloves was so comfortable, she forgot she was wearing them.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is practical or comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent1: The wearability of the backpack was important for his hiking trip.
meanings.sent2: When choosing a winter coat, she always considers the wearability in cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The wearability of the hat made him look like a stylish explorer.
meanings.sent4: The wearability of the new shoes was like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The wearability of the dress made her feel confident and at ease during the event.
